vignette.name: Distribute Objects
vignette.bodytext: Max can help you distribute object evenly along a horitontal or vertical axis.

ul.li: Select the objects you wish to distribute.
Choose Horizontally from the Distribute submenu under the Arrange menu.

bluebox.bodytext: After you've invoked distribute, you can tune the object spacing with handles.

ul.li: Grab a handle and drag in the direction you wish to space the objects.
